pages.text: Vault Hunters is a $(l)progression based Action RPG$() Game.$(br2)It is aimed to be played over a $(l)longer period$() of time and has many accessibility settings to $(l)customise$() the experience of the playthrough.

pages.title: Introduction
pages.text: $(br)In this modpack, the goal is to progress through the game by running $(l)Vaults$(). Vaults are located in $(l)another dimension$() that can $(l)temporarily$() be entered by the player.$(br2)Each Vault contains $(l)loot$() that can enhance the gameplay.$(br2)Progressing through Vaults also gives $(l)Vault Experience$(). Level advancement is a crucial element of the modpack.
